segments.name: THOUGHT
segments.text: I open my eyes and stare at the aircraft in front of me

segments.name: Mysterious jet
segments.text: E... Excuse me! Not replying is RUDE!

segments.name: Mysterious jet
segments.text:
Hmmmm, no good!
Anyways, where are you flying today?

segments.name: Mysterious jet
segments.text: What? Every plane has somewhere to be. Do you need help?

segments.name: Anna
segments.text:
Neat!

My name is Anna, nice to meet you!

segments.name: Anna
segments.text:
Every day you have somewhere new to go. 
Why not find a place to go today?
